name: Untitled Zombie Game (m1ksu)
description:
middle mouse to delete orders, forgot to mention that

CONTROLS
Left mouse button: draw "no-crossing"-line
Right mouse button: draw "go-here"-point (only during preparing-time
WASD: move camera
Scroll: zoom camera

A top-down zombie horde survival game where the game is played by AI.

Keep your guys alive.
Defend the cake.

The only thing you can do is tell your guys where to move when the wave hasn't started, and tell your guys where they can't go when the wave has started.

Use this to make the best out of your environment; the zombies are agile, and giving your minions a good sightline to shoot them before they get near is crucial for survival against the ever increasing horde.
